item.title: My Google Certification
item.description: My Certification This certification is issued by Coursera. You can verify its authenticity here. <!DOCTYPE html> My Certifications AWS Fundamentals: Going Cloud-Native Learn how to build cloud-native applications on AWS. View on Coursera AWS Fundamentals: Addressing Security Risk Learn how to identify and address security risks on AWS. View on Coursera AWS DevOps Engineer Professional Learn how to develop and deploy secure, scalable, and reliable applications on AWS. View on Coursera Fundamentals of Red Hat OpenShift Learn how to deploy and manage applications on Red Hat OpenShift.
